CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL( NSS_Team__c,'Inbound'),CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,'VIRTUAL SALES CORE')),'Sales-All Inbound', IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Sales_Org__c,'NSS'),CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,'Forms')),'Sales-All Inbound', IF(AND(ISPICKVAL( NSS_Team__c,'Inbound'),CONTAINS(UserRole.Name,'PEO')),'Sales-All Inbound', IF(ISPICKVAL( NSS_Team__c,'Inbound-Oasis'),'Sales-All Inbound', User_Cadence_Type__c ))))
CustomField.label: User Cadence Type Group
